description: These cargo pants are cut from durable cotton canvas and feature a rugged camo pattern.
fitting_details: Slim Fit: sits low at the waist. Slim through the leg.
Size 32W has a 10" rise and a 15" leg opening.
Belt loops. Side adjusters. Zip fly with a signature buttoned closure.
Two front snapped pockets. Right hip coin pocket. Cargo pocket at each leg. Two back snapped pockets.
"Utility Polo RL" label above the back right pocket.
Model is 6'1"/185 cm and wears a size 32W x 32L.
product: Slim Fit Camo Canvas Cargo Pant
